mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_NAME EMPLOYEENAME, IMAGE_URL IMAGEURL, (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID=EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) TEAMNAME, (SELECT POSITION_NAME FROM POSITION WHERE POSITION_ID = EMPLOYEE.POSITION_ID) POSITIONNAME, EMAIL FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE IS_AUTHORITY='N'
SELECT TEAM_ID TEAMID,TEAM_NAME TEAMNAME FROM TEAM
SELECT POSITION_ID POSITIONID,POSITION_NAME POSITIONNAME FROM POSITION ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(POSITION_ID) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE( EMPLOYEE_NO, TEAM_ID, EMAIL, EMPLOYEE_NAME, JOIN_DATE, POSITION_ID, PASSWORD, IS_AUTHORITY, ROLE, IMAGE_URL) VALUES ( EMPLOYEE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{teamId}, #{email}, #{employeeName}, SYSDATE, #{positionId}, #{password}, 'N', 'USER', #{imageUrl} )
mapper.select: select * from EMPLOYEE,TEAM where ROLE !='ADMIN' and EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID=TEAM.TEAM_NAME
SELECT PASSWORD from EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NAME=#{employeeName} and EMAIL=#{email}

SELECT EMPLOYEE_NO EMPLOYEENO, TEAM_ID TEAMID, (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID=EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) TEAMNAME, (SELECT POSITION_NAME FROM POSITION WHERE POSITION_ID=EMPLOYEE.POSITION_ID) POSITIONNAME, EMAIL, EMPLOYEE_NAME EMPLOYEENAME, JOIN_DATE JOINDATE, POSITION_ID POSITIONID, PASSWORD, ROLE, IS_AUTHORITY ISAUTHORITY, IMAGE_URL IMAGEURL FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO=#{employeeNo } AND PASSWORD=#{password }

SELECT EMPLOYEE_NO EMPLOYEENO, TEAM_ID TEAMID, EMAIL, EMPLOYEE_NAME EMPLOYEENAME, JOIN_DATE JOINDATE, POSITION_ID POSITIONID, PASSWORD, ROLE, IS_AUTHORITY IS_AUTHORITY, FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO=#{employeeNo }
